chat.msg: hola, q tal? ready to start?
yes
oki doki. i'm at the starting point
i see a small island with a tiger to my left. what's next?
the bird
gotcha
to get to the parrot, i need to go to the big island south-west of the tiger, right?
yes
all right, i'm at the parrot now
where to now?
southeast to the frog
ok, so i cross the 3 rocks to reach the frog in the new island?
yes
alright, now i'm chillin' with the frog
whats next?
you need to go northwest across the alligator over the rock and by the elephant
ah, oki
so i go to my left where the crocodile is, and then reach the big island with the elephant. am i correct?
yes
cool, i'm with the elephant now
where to now?
go west across the rocls where you will reach the giraffe
alright, west to the giraffe it is
made it safe and sound. what now?
go down where you will pass a snake and then you reached the treasure
oh, alright
so i go south-east where the snake is and then 2 steps to the east and i should find the treasure, right?
yes
i've made it! found the treasure
*finished*. was fun playing! thanks for guiding me
hola, you ready?
yes
cool! let's start
take a few steps left from the white dog, below that wooden bench, and cross the trail heading towards a florist stand. don't reach the stand yet!
okay
awesome! now pull a u-turn on the left, cross back over the trail and head towards our white dog friend
give him a wave from me!
okay
now, let's go southwards, cross over that branch there
keep heading south until you spot another white dog chillin' next to a red and white checkered picnic site
okay
great job! now, walk over the mat, swipe a berry if you fancy, and continue west
okay
fantastic! find that other wooden branch that crosses the river and use it to head north
oaky
once you've crossed the river, there's a green bush, just avoid it by circling it from the right side until you spot the florist stand again
okay
alright! now, turn left and go below the stand
see that big bridge with two cyclists? head towards it
right at the bridge
sweet! pass the bridge then just past it, you'll see two elderly people deep in their papers on a bench
see the two elderly people
awesome! now move a few steps south, squeeze yourself between those old folks and another wooden branch
you'll hit a green bush right next to the end of the branch. can you see it?
hi there! que comience el juego!!
howdy
hiya! i'm currently at the tent up north
where should i head to first from here?
head south were you will squeeze pass some rock and a dog
got it, i see the dog sitting next to the fire
should i go towards the fire or pass by the dog?
pass the dog and then towards the fire then go around  the fire going up toward the dog then down away from the bush and away from the mushrooms
alright, i'm bypassing the dog and fire now
should i keep going south towards that blue car?
yes
cool. i'm now at the blue car
i see a telescope towards the south and there are some rocks to the west. which direction should i go?
go south towards the telescope then go around the teleschoop then head northwest towards the rocks and your reach the cabin
okay, i'm heading south towards the telescope
and now turning northwest towards the rocks. and yes, i see the cabin! *finished* buddy, we did it! where to next?
hola, q tal? ready to go?
yes
cool! step right under the first palm tree and move towards the second one
make a sharp left turn just before the third tree and head south
kk
alright! you see that cute brown puppy? move to its left side, swerve a bit to your left, then turn right going south
kk
great! now, head straight between that huge rock on your left and the teeny one on your right till you hit the water
don't worry, your shoes are waterproof!
kk
right, see that flashy crab? turn right and walk alongside the big rock, keep going, let's do this!
kk
nice! keep going until you spot a medium-sized rock
you're about to meet our toothy friend - the shark. as soon as you see it, make a sharp right turn
kk
well done! let's head back to dry land now
cross between the medium rock and that colourful beach ball, and then head north
kk
next, you're gonna veer slightly left and head northwest
slide between that funky red tent and a big speaker on your right
kk
take a walk around the tent in a semi-circle, but don't go too far! we're going south next
